FuncDef: The reset ipv6 nd security timestamp command clears the timestamp in SEND messages on a specified interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears the timestamp in SEND messages on a specified the name of an interface.
-

Clears the timestamp in SEND messages on a specified the type and number of an interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd security timestamp GigabitEthernet 1/0/1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset ipv6 nd security timestamp command clears the timestamp cached by the system when sending SEND messages. If further SEDN messages are received, the system will discard the messages because no matching timestamp can be found in the cache. Exercise caution when running this command.
